dictionary.lore: An odd device made from an optimized Tech Gizmo. By modifying the output limiter on the back of the head, this upgraded piece turns its wearer into a fighting machine. It's whereabouts are still unknown, and instructions on its use as well as its history are sealed up tight within the vaults of the Sama Kingdom.

name: 技宝バトルブースター2
